meanings.definition: A chemical compound found in plants that may have health benefits.
meanings.sent1: Eating fruits and vegetables rich in phytochemicals can help improve your overall health.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying different phytochemicals to understand their potential health effects.
meanings.sent3: The phytochemicals in this salad are like tiny superheroes fighting for your well-being.
meanings.sent4: Herbal teas are like a treasure trove of phytochemical goodness waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: Imagine phytochemicals as the secret agents of plants, working behind the scenes to keep them healthy and strong.

meanings.definition: Any of various biologically active compounds found in plants.
meanings.sent1: The diversity of phytochemicals in nature is truly fascinating.
meanings.sent2: Many supplements claim to contain beneficial phytochemicals extracted from plants.
meanings.sent3: The garden seemed to whisper secrets about the phytochemicals hidden in its greenery.
meanings.sent4: In the world of plants, phytochemicals are like the magical potions that keep them thriving.
meanings.sent5: The air was filled with the sweet scent of flowers, carrying with it the essence of phytochemical wonders.
